data.title: Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ, Family Games, Violin Paradise and Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective DS demo
data.text:
Here are this week's downloads, demos and videos for the Wii and Nintendo DS:

WiiWare: Family Games ($5), Lilt Line ($5) and Violin Paradise ($7)

Virtual Console: Darius Twin for Super NES ($8)

DSiWare: Jam Space: PocketStudio ($5), Just Sing! Christmas Songs ($2) and Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ ($8)

Rock Band 3 (due Tuesday, December 14): Billy Joel The Hits Pack ($20 or $2-3 each) with "Big Shot," "Captain Jack," "It's Still Rock and Roll To Me," "Movin' Out (Anthony's Song)," "Only the Good Die Young," "Piano Man," "Pressure," "Say Goodbye to Hollywood," "The Entertainer," "The Stranger," "We Didn't Start the Fire" and "You May Be Right"

Rock Band 2/Rock Band 3 Rock Band Network tracks: None

DS Demos (via Wii's Nintendo Channel): Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective plus repeats Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth, America's Test Kitchen: Let's Get Cooking, Bakugan Battle Brawlers, Battle of Giants: Mutant Insects, Brain Age, Brain Age 2, Crafting Mama, Crosswords DS, Dragon Ball: Origins 2, Flash Focus, Fossil Fighters, Ivy the Kiwi?, Mystery Case Files: MillionHeir, Personal Trainer: Math, Pokemon Ranger: Guardian Signs, Picross 3D, Rhythm Heaven, Rooms DS, Sonic Colors and Women's Murder Club: Games of Passion

Game Videos: Donkey Kong Country Returns, Family Games, Flipnote Studio, Golden Sun: Dark Dawn, Jam Space: PocketStudio, Just Sing! Christmas Songs, Lilt Line, Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ, Super Mario Bros. 3, Violin Paradise and Wizards of Waverly Place: Spellbound

This page contains a single entry by Gamewatcher published on December 13, 2010 6:17 PM.

Game Releases - Quake Arena, X-Men, Treasures of Montezuma, OnLive for iPad, World of Goo for iPhone and Yoga & Pilates for Wii was the previous entry in this blog.
